requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

results.name: Al Emmo & the Lost Dutchman's Mine

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 또는 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 이상
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 (4GB VRAM 이상)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
